unnormalised: Heard the buzz, folks? Home loan schemes are hotter than jalebis on a winter morning! Especially with Diwali just around the corner.
normalised: Heard the buzz, folks? Home loan schemes are hotter than jalebis on a winter morning! Especially with Diwali just around the corner.

unnormalised: HDFC and SBI are practically throwing offers at you, like free application processing if you apply before 30/10/2024. Seriously, though, compare interest rates – even a 0.25% difference can save you a fortune over 20 years! Remember Sharmaji from next door who jumped in last year? He’s already started planning his griha pravesh for 14/01/2025!
normalised: H D F C and S B I are practically throwing offers at you, like free application processing if you apply before thirtieth October two thousand and twenty four. Seriously, though, compare interest rates – even a zero point two five percent difference can save you a fortune over twenty years! Remember Sharmaji from next door who jumped in last year? He’s already started planning his griha pravesh for fourteenth January two thousand and twenty five!

unnormalised: New schemes also cater to first-time buyers in Tier 2 cities like Lucknow and Jaipur. They're offering up to Rs. 5 Lakh subsidy under PMAY.
normalised: New schemes also cater to first-time buyers in Tier two cities like Lucknow and Jaipur. They're offering up to rupee five lakh subsidy under P M A Y.

unnormalised: But, quick tip: don't just fall for the 'low EMI' trap. Check hidden charges. Banks usually start their working day from 10:00 hrs, so better get your papers ready before hitting up the branch. Also, remember to negotiate hard. You might just snag a better deal. Happy house hunting! And yeah, don't forget to budget for those new curtains. After all, a new home deserves a fresh look!
normalised: But, quick tip: don't just fall for the 'low E M I' trap. Check hidden charges. Banks usually start their working day from ten hundred hours, so better get your papers ready before hitting up the branch. Also, remember to negotiate hard. You might just snag a better deal. Happy house hunting! And yeah, don't forget to budget for those new curtains. After all, a new home deserves a fresh look!
